summary: The customer asked about additional products that could be added to their Contoso Wireless plan and the agent provided information about phone upgrades, data plans, international calling plans, and more. The agent also explained that there are no additional fees associated with adding these products and that the customer can manage their account online. The agent also mentioned that the customer can track their data usage and call minutes in real time through the online portal and can take advantage of discounts, free shipping, exclusive offers, and a loyalty program.
